Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: This Instrument Prepared By: Northeast State Community College Office of Vice President for Business Affairs 2425 Highway 75 Blountville, TN 37617 Use Agreement This Agreement, entered into as of this________day of________________, 20___, made by and between the Tennessee Board of Regents, on behalf of Northeast State Community College, hereinafter called the Owner, and King College, hereinafter called the User. WITNESSETH: A. This Agreement provides for the User to have access to and use of certain facilities of the Owner for specific hours and days, with the Owner retaining the facilities for its own use during other times, and the Owner retaining responsibility for normal utilities, security, upkeep, maintenance, and custodial care. The general Terms and Conditions (Attachment A) are hereby made a part of this Agreement as fully as if incorporated verbatim herein, and are those contained in pages 4 and 5 of this agreement. B. TERM OF AGREEMENT: The term of this Agreement shall commence on January 1,2010 and shall end on August 31,2010 _. Normal Notice for Termination shall be 90 days. C. RENTAL shall be: D. $34,896.00 , payable in installments of $2,908.00 per month . NOTICES shall be addressed: to Owner at: to User at: Northeast State Community College Office of Vice President for Business Affairs P. O. Box 246 Blountville, TN 37617 King College Attn: James Donahue 1350 King College Road Bristol, TN 37620 E. LOCATION: The Owner hereby agrees to let the User access and make use of certain premises with the appurtenances situated in the County of Washington , City of Gray , located at 120 Dillon Court , and more particularly described as follows: (1) Primary Use Area: The User will have full use of this area: Area Sq. Ft. Room #105 Classroom 913 Room # 106 Office 194 Room #107 Office 261 Room #124 Classroom 1.103 Total Primary Sq. Ft. 2,381 (2) Secondary Use Area: The User will be further permitted to use these common areas on the same premises: Restrooms (486 sq. ft. x 23%) 112 sq. ft. (3) Restricted Area: The User will refrain from entering or using these areas: None (4) During the Term of this Use Agreement, the User shall have use of Primary and Secondary areas during the following periods: No restrictions on use periods. (5) Exceptions to the normal periods of use, due to Owner closings for holidays or other reasons, include: January 1, 2010 January 18,2010 April 2,2010 May 31,2010 July 5,2010 (6) Specific scheduling of User’s activities on the premises shall be managed by: Steven R. Campbell (7) The User shall generally confine its activities on premises to the following purposes: Education IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Agreement has been executed by the parties hereto: BY: Charles W. Manning, Chancellor Tennessee Board of Regents Dr. Gregory D. Jordan King College Attachment A
